name: Sacred Symbol: Cernium
description:
The Sacred Symbol of #cCernium# is filled with Sacred Power, which#c increases the main stat# of whoever possesses it. 
Equip this Sacred Symbol and feed it duplicates from your inventory by #cdouble-clicking# them to grant it experience.
Stat boosts granted by the Sacred Symbol are not affected by % stat boosts.
